item.title: AVI - Connect Keycloak to vIDB and AVI Loadbalancer
item.description:
Introduction

Today, I would like to address the topic of how Keycloak can be used as a central identity management system with VCF9 and the Advanced Load Balancer. In theory, this is relatively easy to implement, but in practice, there are a few challenges. Today, I would like to describe exactly what these are and also present a solution. As a little bonus, I will also show you how to use a Fido Key to log in.
